name: MAJOR COUNTY SHERIFFS OF AMERICA
sampleDescriptions: The Major County Sheriffs of America is dedicated to working with government and congressional officials to advocate and proactively identifying issues relevant to the law enforcement community.
The Major County Sheriffs of America is dedicated to working with government and congressional officials to advocate and proactively identifying issues relevant to the law enforcement community.
Assist Major County Sheriffs of America with issues related to law enforcement and legislation that affect performance of law enforcement duties.
